params._to: The recipient of the claimed token

claimToken(address).notice: Claims the full amount of a specified token

claimTokenAmountTo(address,uint256,addre.notice: Claims a specified token amount to a specified address

getSplitPercentageForUser(address).notice: Gets the split ratio percentage for a given user

getTokenBalClaimableForUser(address,addr.notice: Gets the token balance claimable for a specified user

getTokenBalClaimedForUser(address,addres.notice: Gets the token balance already claimed for a given user

documentation.text: @dev Helper to calculate a claimable token balance
